title: Jonathan Kodjia - Wikipedia
snippet: Jonathan Adjo Kodjia (born 22 October 1989) is a professional footballer who plays as a forward for Championnat National club Versailles.

title: Jonathan Kodjia
snippet: Kodjia played amateur football in the Paris suburbs at a district level, including for local clubs such as Stains, and had an unsuccessful trial at the prestigious INF Clairefontaine academy.[12] At age 17 in 2007, he nearly quit the sport to focus on his studies, having earned a baccalaureate in accountancy.[10][12] Following intervention from his mother, he joined Noisy-le-Sec, a club at national level, which led to a trial and signing of his first semi-professional contract with Reims' youth setup in March 2008 at age 17.5, where he trained full-time while balancing part-time work.[12][10]
